about_the_game:
Endless Descent is a high-stakes roguelike adventure where every decision matters. Players descend into an ever-changing labyrinth of procedurally generated dungeons, armed with medieval weapons and the resolve to survive. But beware — in Endless Descent, you only have one life. If you fall, everything is lost: your character, your progress, and your hard-earned treasures.

Across multiple dungeon worlds, players search for rare and powerful Soul Stones, mystical artifacts capable of enhancing their abilities or empowering their weapons with unique effects. Each descent presents tougher enemies, unpredictable encounters, and the constant pressure to survive. Victory means growth, but defeat means starting over with nothing but hard-earned knowledge.

With intense, permadeath-driven gameplay, deep customization, and endless replay ability, Endless Descent offers a relentless challenge where only the strongest, smartest, and most adaptable adventurers will endure. How far will you descend before the dungeon takes its toll?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® iCore™ i3-530 or AMD® FX-6350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® iCore™ i5-3570K or AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Internet is required to play

short_description: Endless Descent is a high stakes roguelike where one life is all you get. Descend through endless, procedurally generated dungeons, wield medieval weapons, and seek powerful Soul Stones to enhance your abilities or weapons. Face relentless enemies and see how far you can go before it’s all lost.
